General.Name: Bintang Samudera Mandiri Lines Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Bintang Samudera Mandiri Lines Tbk provides sea transportation and logistics services in Indonesia. It transports mining commodities, such as coal and nickel; infrastructure goods, including cement, sand, pipes, and construction equipment; and fertilizers and clinkers. The company offers shipping agency, bunkering, loading and unloading, and refueling services, as well as ramp door and trestle rental services. It also provides transportation facilities for picking up and loading cargo on barges; charter ship operation services for the delivery of cargo for mining goods and others; marine ship operation management services; and logistics services for vessels and sea loading activities. It operates 8 tugboat units and 7 barge units. The company was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia. PT Bintang Samudera Mandiri Lines Tbk operates as a subsidiary of Pt Goldfive Investment Capital.
General.Address: Rasuna Office Park No. DO-03, Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia, 12960
